behavioral_insights.engagement_patterns: Directors in sales tend to engage with content related to sales strategies, customer relationship management, and leadership development.
behavioral_insights.technology_adoption_trends: Directors in sales are early adopters of sales automation tools, CRM systems, and data analytics platforms to improve sales performance.
behavioral_insights.decision_making_behaviors: Directors in sales often make decisions based on ROI, sales pipeline performance, and customer feedback to drive revenue growth.
behavioral_insights.market_dynamics: Directors in sales are influenced by market trends, competitor analysis, and industry benchmarks to stay competitive in the market.

supporting_data_points.average_engagement_rate_sales_strategy_c: Director-level sales professionals have a 30% higher engagement rate with sales strategy content compared to other titles.
supporting_data_points.top_technology_adoption_sales_automation: 80% of Directors in sales have adopted sales automation tools in the past year.
